form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Barrasso introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Land and Water Conservation Fund for 10 years, and for other purposes.

section.header: Reauthorization of Land and Water Conservation Fund
section.text: Section 200302 of title 54, United States Code, is amended by striking September 30, 2015 each place it appears and inserting September 30, 2025.

section.header: Allocation for Federal and State purposes

subsection.text: Section 200303 of title 54, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in the first sentence, by striking Amounts deposited and inserting the following:
in the second sentence, by striking The appropriations and inserting the following:
in the third sentence, by striking Amounts made available and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following:

subsection.header: Allocation for Federal and State purposes
subsection.text: The appropriations deposited in the Fund under this section shall be made available as described in this chapter in the ratio of—
Section 200304 of title 54, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in the first sentence, by striking There and inserting the following:
by striking the second sentence and inserting the following:

subsection.text: The statement under subsection (a) shall include assurances that, in accordance with section 200303(d), of the amounts made available from the Fund for the ensuing fiscal year—

paragraph.text: 60 percent shall be used for State purposes; and
40 percent shall be used for Federal purposes.
